messages.message: Hey thank you for the connect!

No problem! Thanks for accepting. I did saw your profile updated on indeed today thus was curious if you are looking for some new opportunities in Phoenix? If yes, I would be glad to help you out with that. I take care of positions all across Arizona and California.

I am actually on the job hunt currently. I would love to know if you have a need in Phoenix for an enthusiastic software developer. I've been programming for over 15 years. How are things going for you? Any suggestions for Phoenix?

Phoenix does have a lot of exciting positions coming up but there are not a lot of good developers out there to grab them. I think we are also communication back and forth in email. Lets schedule a call sometime this week to discuss further as I'm out of office most of next week and first two days of week after that.
